title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Ex-Central Michigan Staffers Receive Punishments for UM Sign-Stealing Scandal
items.description: Ex-CMU coach Jim McElwain and others are facing potential suspensions for their alleged role in Michigan's sign-stealing scandal.

items.title: Bengals Defense Holds Players-Only Meeting After Losing to Win-Less Jets
items.description: The Cincinnati Bengals defense ranks 30th in the NFL in points allowed per drive.

items.title: Rose Bowl, city sue UCLA for alleged SoFi plan
items.description: The Rose Bowl and the city of Pasadena have sued UCLA for allegedly trying to move its games to the newer SoFi Stadium, which is closer to campus.

items.title: Nebraska's Rhule signs extension through 2032
items.description: Nebraska has signed coach Matt Rhule to a two-year contract extension which will take him through the 2032 season, the school announced Thursday.
